manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hyaluronic Acid Care for Blonde Hair Blond Absolu Whatever Your Blonde: You Dare, We Care. Blond Absolu provides instant care for the hair fiber and anti-brass neutralization to achieve that ideal cool blonde tone. Blond Absolu is formulated with ultra-violet neutralizers, hydrates, and fortifies the hair fiber for illuminated hair from within.

Previous page Expert Formulas Powered by Hyaluronic Acid & Edelweiss Flower Hyaluronic Acid: Strengthens damaged hairEdelweiss Flower: Protect & soften sensitized hair Fusio-Dose Professional In-Salon Treatment Instant Transformation, Infinite Possibilities. In-Salon Service Your appointment Make an appointment in your Kérastase salon for a personalized hair diagnosis. Next page 1 Discover 2 Fusio-Dose 3 In-Salon Service

Ultra-Violet Shampoo Neutralizes brassy and yellow undertonesNourishes and strengthens damaged blonde hairEnhances softness and shine Discover Cicaflash Conditioner Nourishes to instantly restore damaged hairStrengthens to protect against breakage and split endsDeeply moisturizes to soften hair Discover Ultra-Violet Hair Mask Neutralizes brassy and yellow undertonesNourishes and strengthens damaged blonde hairEnhances softness and shine Discover Cicaplasme Hair Serum Strengthens hair to prevent damage and breakageProtects from heat damage up to 450°FSmooths hair to enhance shine Discover Cicanuit Hair Serum Strengthens Hair Damaged by Lightening TreatmentsProtects Against Breakage and Split EndsHydrates to Smooth Hair and Enhance Shine Discover Cicaextreme Hair Oil Recovers and Strengthens Damaged Blonde HairReduces Frizz and Split EndsDelivers a Soft, High-Shine Finish Discover

Can I use Cicaflash Conditioner if I don’t have blonde hair? Yes, you can use Cicaflash even if you are not a blonde. All hair can benefit from being fortified and deep fiber healing with weightless moisture. Cicaflash was specifically formulated with all blondes in mind but anyone can use it. Can I leave Cicaflash Conditioner on for longer than 5 minutes? Yes, many clients leave it in for up to 30 mins. but we do suggest to rinse out Cicaflash. We’ve found that the hair attains all the benefits after 5 minutes and cumulatively over time. What is the addictive fragrance in Cicaflash Conditioner? The fragrance is called California Splash, an aromatic and luxurious fragrance that takes you through an orchard of blooming flowers and dazzling citrus notes, giving you a sense of spring in a bottle. Can I use Cicaflash Conditioner without Bain Lumiere shampoo? Yes, the product is still effective without Bain Lumiere shampoo. However, we suggest using the 3-step Blond Absolu Cleanse, Treat and Prime routine for maximum hydration and hair repairing effects. Can I use Cicaflash Conditioner on curly hair? Yes, Cicaflash Conditioner is recommended for all blonde hair types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: I found this brand and conditioner through my hair stylist and absolutely love it!! She has moved on to different product brands, but I still love this! It makes my hair so soft and silky without build up. Keeps my blonde hair bright! The price is salon prices, but it’s good enough to pay full price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Shampoo and Conditioner
reviews.reviewText: The Blonde version has helped my grey hair look shiny and no brassy color. The tint makes the grey a little darker with rich undertones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Omg! The only conditioner I will ever use again!
reviews.reviewText: Ok, so long story here. I had extremely damaged hair post bariatric surgery from hormonal changes. I told my stylist I wanted to go blonde. Used this on her recommendation and about 6 months later I am Daenerys blonde, and using this still (now with the matching purple shampoo). I swear the stuff is magic. My hair is in the best condition of my life. Love it! 100% best stuff I’ve ever used (and I’m a guinea pig for hair products, tried MANY.) If you have bleached hair or want to, either way, try this, you won’t regret!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A deep conditioner that keeps your hair from getting brassy
reviews.reviewText: I love Kerastase hair products.. I find they really work and you only need a small amount… although a little pricey the quality is very rich and powerful…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy buen producto
reviews.reviewText: Es pequeño para el precio pero es muy buen producto para cabellos rubios, tiene buen olor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for blondes
reviews.reviewText: Does work really well for brassy/yellow tones in hair. Does not leave hair overly gray. Hair doesn’t seem super conditioned afterward and I’ve noticed hair seems more tangled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aroma y suavidad!
reviews.reviewText: Es mi favorito entre muuuchos que he tenido! Lo seguiré comprando!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blond hair conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Love this product! Keeps yellowing of processed hair away, easy to use in the shower-not bulky.
O produto complementa os cuidados após o shampoo e a máscara, o cabelo fica uma seda, aspecto de bem cuidado e cheiro muito elegante. Adorei.

Definitivamente por algo es lider la marca kerastase para el cabello, este acondicionador es fenomenal, huele riquisimo y tiene el efecto de un tratamiento de cabello, aun no noto sus efectos matificantes, pero el cabello lo deja hidratado, desenredado, manejable, sin frizz, se ve saludable, definitivamente es mi nuevo favorito y volveré a comprar!
This is a great product for my thick grey hair. I love Kerastase. It was delivered fast as well!
Como siempre la. Marca kerastase de lo mejor q he probado, es cara si, pero vale la pena.
Hab es nur einmal genommen, Meike Haare ist hinterher sehr weich und glänzend ！und die Geruch ist auch sehr schön! Werde ixh immer weiter kaufen ！
